mobileExam.description: 这个会显示在页面上方的一个导航条，建议尽量翻译的短一些

points.description:
手机考试 -> 考试详情 -> 及格分数 
 手机考试 -> 考试详情 -> 进入考试 -> 滑动到第一页 -> 奖杯图标右侧 
 手机考试 -> 交卷后 -> 考试详情 -> 用户头像右侧 
 手机考试 -> 交卷后 -> 考试详情 -> 答题记录列表 (需要用户有多个答题记录，才会弹出答题记录列表)

minutes.description: 手机考试 -> 考试详情 -> 考试限时

timesOf.description: 手机考试 -> 考试详情 -> 答题次数

betweenTime.description: 手机考试 -> 考试详情 -> 考试时间

clickUpload.message: Click to upload  photo for verification

faceTip1.message: Verified photo is used for exams using face recognition scanning purpose. Be sure to upload real photos. Teachers will check them. If they find that the photos are not consistent with the students, students will be regarded as cheating, which may result in the cancellation of examination results.

faceTip2.message: Verified photo cannot be modified after uploading

faceTip4.message: Verified photo cannot be modified after uploading. Please be sure to face verification successfully and upload again.

testFace.message: Test if the face verification is successful

faceTip5.message: Face verification failed? Click to use verification code to verify

faceTip6.message: Your face identity is verified and the exam will start in 3 seconds.

enterCodeTip.message: Please ask invigilator for the verification code.

faceTip7.message: Face-scanning is not available, please download the new version of APP

faceTip8.message: Please verify that the photo can be successfully verified in face verification

faceTip9.message: Teacher currently hasn’t set verification codes or the verification code has expired

examTip2.message: Please do not leave the exam interface of ULearn APP

examTip4.message: Once the system detects {num} times of leaving exam halfway, it will force submitting your paper.

examTip6.message: If the exam is allowed to be re-sit, your score will be based on the one with the highest score.

examTip7.message: After the beginning of the exam, students need to answer questions carefully. Do not click "Submit answer" straight away without answering.

examTip8.message: Exam paper may be divided into several parts. Please check the exam paper carefully and check the answer card before submitting the exam paper so as to avoid missing the questions.

examTip9.message: The top of the exam paper will show the remaining time. When the remaining time is 0, system will submit paperautomatically.

examDetailTip1.message: We have detected that you have not submitted the exam paper. Now the exam is over, please submit your exam record.

authTip1.message: You haven't completed the photo verification and you can't enter the exam.

noExamTip2.message: You’re late for the exam beyond the prescribed time, you can’t enter the exam.

examTip10.message: Do not leave the APP exam interface during the examination.

examTip11.message: During the examination, please do not leave the APP exam interface. Every time you leave, it will be recorded.

examTip12.message: Please pay attention to the remaining time when answering questions. When the time is up, the paper will be submitted automatically.

examTip13.message: Before submitting the paper, please check carefully to avoid missing the questions.

examTip14.message: If the exam is allowed to be answeredseveral times, your score will be based on the one with the highest score.

examTip17.message: Enter the exam by verification code

examTip18.message: In order to prevent cheating for exams, the system will record the equipment used to take the exam, IP address, behavior track of entering/leaving pages, etc., please do not log in the non-exam area.

notJoined.message: You did not take the exam.

notViewScore.message: The results of the exam won’t be published temporarily.

scoring.message: Please wait patiently while the subjective questions are being reviewed.

notViewAnswer.message: No answer records are recorded in this exam.

teaNoExam.message: Teacher hasn't published the exam yet.

viewOnPC.message: Please check the exam results on the computer.

enterExamTip.message: It is detected that you have not submitted exam paper. You can continue to take the exam and submit it later.

lateExam.message: Late for the exam, can’t enter the exam

autoSaveFailed.message: Failed to save automatically. Check the network

submitTip1.message: You have {num} questions have been not answered, sure to submit？

hintTip1.message: System detects that you’ve left the exam.

hintTip2.message: The system detected that you left the exam at {time} .

hintTip3.message: You have left the exam {totalCount} times and system will forcibly submit your paper.

hintTip4.message: If you leave the exam screen for more than {totalCount} times, your exam will be submitted involuntarily. You still have {count} times remaining.

answerScore1.message: Score: To be graded, out of {num} points
answerScore1.description: 手机考试 -> 交卷后 -> 考试详情 -> 答题记录 (需要考试设置为显示答案)

answerScore2.description: 手机考试 -> 交卷后 -> 考试详情 -> 答题记录 (需要考试设置为显示答案)

useUp.message: The number of playback has been used up.

playTip.message: Note: This recording can only be played {num} times.

recordUploadFailed.message: The recording upload failed, please check the network!

reRecordTip.message: The original recordings will be deleted. Are you sure to record again?

lateLimitTips.message: Not allowed to take the exam after {time} minutes from the start of the exam

submitLimitTips.message: Not allowed to submit within {time} minutes from the beginning of the exam

IPMonitorTip.message: {ip} is on - Do not switch to another network during the exam!

deviceMonitorTip.message: {device} is on - Do not switch to another device or browser during the exam!

photoMonitorTip.message: {photo} is on - Keep your device's front-facing camera on!

faceRecognitionTip.message: {face} is on - Need to pass face verification to start the exam!

IPExceptionTips1.message: IP monitoring is on. Students are not allowed to switch to another network during the exam. Switching the network may cause the IP address to change.

IPExceptionTips2.message: If you need to change the network under special circumstances, please ask the proctor for the verification code, and use the code to enter the exam.

deviceExceptionTips1.message: The device monitoring is on and you are not allowed to change the device or browser during the exam. Please use the device or browser that entered the exam for the first time to answer the questions.

deviceExceptionTips2.message: If you need to change the device/browser under special circumstances, please ask the proctor for the verification code, and use the code to enter the exam.

commitLimitTimeTips.message: You can submit only {time} minutes after the start of the exam!

screenMonitorTips.message: Screen monitoring is on. For students who leave the exam {num} times, the exam will be submitted involuntarily.

cameraAccess.message: The camera access is not enabled. Face verification or camera monitoring is on for this exam -Please enable the camera access to take the exam!

showAfterBatchEnd.message: Will be posted after all exam sessions are done

versionLowerTips.message: The current version is too old - Please upgrade before taking the exam!

viewOnPCExe.message: Please take the exam via ULearning lockdown browser

mobilePermissionTip1.message: The camera access is disabled and cannot use this function - Please go to your device's Settings to enable it!

mobilePermissionTip2.message: The microphone access is disabled and cannot use this function - Please go to your device's Settings to enable it!

netWorkErrorNew.message: Network error! Please check the network connection.

netWorkErrorMsg.message: The current network is unstable, and continuing to answer questions may cause the answer record to be lost. If the network cannot be restored temporarily, it is recommended to withdraw from the exam with the consent of the teacher, and reschedule the exam later.

quiteExamAgain.message: Are you sure you want to exit?

submitPaperErrorMsg.message:
Network error, failed to submit!
You can try to resubmit. If the network continues to be abnormal and cannot be restored temporarily, it is recommended to withdraw from the exam with the consent of the teacher.
